resources.string: check if you work on this day

Start Tracking / Stop Tracking:
Allows you to create clock-in or clock-out events as if you tapped the "Start" or "Stop" buttons at the selected time.

Flex:
Allows you to define the working time for the selected day.
Event at 00:00 = flexi time will stay the same as before if no work is clocked (as if the day wasn't a work day)
Event at any other time = set working time to the selected hour(s) and minutes(s)
Example: regular working time is 8 hours, flex event at 03:30 => required working time for the day is 3,5 hours

If you have problems using the location or WiFi tracking method, you may disable Android\'s built-in battery optimization so the app is not restricted so much by the system. This may stress the battery slightly more, but if you grant this, the app can be active in the background and thus help you track your work time automatically.\n\nIf you want that, please allow it in the following dialog.

Nothing to do - either your Android system is old enough to not have battery optimization yet, or the app is already on the system\'s exemption list for battery optimization and thus can be active in the background.
The task cannot be deleted because it is still used in events.
The task cannot be deleted because it is the last one.\n\nFirst create another one, then delete this one (or just rename it).
only on last working day if disabled
in minutes, e.g. 15 (has to be a divisor of 60) - when time rounding is enabled, the worked time per day is rounded up to the closest multiple of this
will only be active if wi-fi radio is enabled
name of a visible wi-fi SSID - you don\'t need to be connected
Automatic flexi reset, at start of selected interval
Useful for clocking in/out via a connected device, e.g. a smartwatch (combined with non-persistent notifications, see below)

Pro: notifications can be synced to connected devices, e.g. a smartwatch / Contra: notifications are not pinned at the top of the list and also can be closed unintentionally (but will come back after a minute)
Don\'t notify audibly or by vibration at all
File an event of the type
Do you want to use your current location as work place? The work place coordinates you may have entered before will be overwritten! (It could take some seconds to find out your current location.)
Do you want to activate backup on Google servers? This setting can be changed anytime under options.
Restore failed, no backup files found.
Delete everything and replace it with the content of the restore files: \"%1$s\"?
Events: Times per Task and Hint
Events: times per task and hint (daily)
Events: times per task and hint (weekly)
Events: times per task and hint (monthly)
less information will be shown in notification (only works on Android 6 or later)
reduce weekly target by flexi overtime
if enabled, every tracking method (location, wifi) generates separate events - if disabled, only first clock-in and last clock-out counts
The category used for standard notifications of Track Work Time.
The category used for service notifications of Track Work Time.

You are about to send the logs of everything that happened today in Track Work Time to the developer.

The logs may contain personal data - if so, it will kept strictly confidential and only used to identify the problem.

You are also welcome to send the data to yourself first, check it, anonymize it where necessary and then forward it to android@zephyrsoft.org!

Sorry, Track Work Time just crashed. This should not happen. Please send an error report to the developer so the problem can be fixed!

The report may contain personal data - if so, it will kept strictly confidential and only used to identify the problem.
You can add a comment here, e.g. to describe which action produced the error:
Set working time to target time

string-array.name: day_targets
string-array.item: Set working time to target time

resources.string:
TrackWorkTime was updated.
The new version adds support for handling different time zones. Your existing data will be migrated now. Please check that the currently selected home timezone is correct!
This app collects location data to enable tracking your work time by location and/or Wi-Fi even when the app is closed or not in use.
\n\nPlease allow it for \"at all times\", even when the app isn\'t visible (else the automatic clock-in feature will not work).
\n\nYou will have to do that in the app\'s system settings, which will open automatically: please choose \"%s\".
\n\nThe system will also ask to show a notification while tracking by location/WiFi is on. If you don\'t want that, don\'t allow notifications.
Please check if the automatic time tracking method you want is still enabled - it could be disabled because the permission was missing until now.
Necessary permission is missing, disabled automatic tracking!

You did not grant the requested permissions. Automatic time tracking is disabled now.

If you change your mind, you can re-enable it later in the options.

If you didn't see any permission dialog, please just wait some minutes (Android imposes a rate limit on permission requests) or manually grant the permission in Android's settings for this app.
You did not grant the requested permissions, so the current location cannot be determined.

It's recommended to let this app write a daily backup of your data to your device or to your SD card (if present).

If you want that, please allow it in the following dialog.

If you don't see any permission dialog, please just wait some minutes (Android imposes a rate limit on permission requests) or manually grant the permission in Android's settings for this app.

This app needs a little space on your device to save a daily backup of your data and the reports you generate.

Please choose a directory in the following dialog, e.g. "Documents". Of course, you're also welcome to create a custom directory.

If you don't want that now, no daily backups will be created and you can't generate any reports (you'll be asked again if you try).

This feature needs to access your device's storage.

Please choose a directory in the following dialog, e.g. "Documents". Of course, you're also welcome to create a custom directory.

If you don't want that now, the feature will not be available.

This app needs a little space on your device to save a daily backup of your data and the reports you generate.

Please select the directory of your choice in the following dialog, e.g. "Documents". Of course, you're also welcome to create a new directory.

If you cancel this, the directory you selected previously will stay active:

%1$s
Please configure and enable Flexi Time in the options, else this won\'t work.
notify events on connected Pebble watch
search for Wi-Fi networks only in this interval (smaller is more exact, but uses slightly more battery)
numbers between 1 and 60 are allowed (interpreted as minutes)
in the main table, show time sums also as decimal number additionally to the normal representation with hours and minutes
No file manager app available which supports opening directories!\n\nPlease install one, e.g. "Simple File Manager" by "Simple Mobile Tools".
target working time cannot be reached today!
regular work time is over since %1$s

New values:

Latitude = %1$s
Longitude = %2$s
Tolerance = %3$s

Please review the settings in the options.
Location-based tracking was switched on already and is still enabled.
You can now enable location-based tracking, just check \"%1$s\".
Could not get the current location. Please ensure that this app can access the coarse location.
automatic clock-in by location and/or WiFi active
adjusted "to" date to match "from" date ("to" cannot be before "from")
adjusted "from" date to match "to" date ("from" cannot be after "to")
The option \"%1$s\" was disabled due to invalid settings.\n\nYou can re-enable it after you have checked the values you entered in that section.
automatic backup failed: no directory access granted
One option was disabled due to invalid values or value combinations.\n\nYou can re-enable it after you checked the values you entered.
%1$d options were disabled due to invalid values or value combinations.\n\nYou can re-enable them after you checked the values you entered.
Disabling the location-based tracking because of missing privileges!
Track Work Time disabled the location-based tracking because of missing privileges. You can re-enable it in the options and then grant the required permissions.
Disabling the wifi-based tracking because of missing privileges!
Track Work Time disabled the wifi-based tracking because of missing privileges. You can re-enable it in the options and then grant the required permissions.
Disabled notifications in the settings because the permission was removed for the app.
Disabled notifications in the settings because the permission was not granted for the app. You can always allow notifications in the Android settings for this app.
Only writes the names of the networks into the app\'s log file on your device, will not be published
